thread.title: Janet Street Porter SLAMS Beyonce for pregnancy announcement saying she looks like a 'petrol station flower display'
thread.title_full: Janet Street Porter SLAMS Beyonce for pregnancy announcement saying she looks like a 'petrol station flower display'

author: Vicki Newman
title: Janet Street Porter SLAMS Beyonce for pregnancy announcement saying she looks like a 'petrol station flower display'
text:
Janet Street Porter SLAMS Beyonce for pregnancy announcement saying she looks like a 'petrol station flower display' They were discussing the singer's Instagram post on Loose Women Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Janet Street Porter slams Beyonce for her pregnancy announcement Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Janet Street Porter has slammed Beyonce 's pregnancy announcement, saying it looks like a 'cheap petrol station flower display'. 
The singer's announcement that she's expecting twins with husband Jay Z was one of the topics of discussion on Thursday's Loose Women . 
Janet was sat on the panel with Andrea McLean, Stacey Solomon and Martine McCutcheon when they discussed the news that almost broke the internet last night. 
As the Loose Women show the photo Beyonce used to announce her pregnancy, they congratulate her and the audience applauds. Read More Janet Street Porter asked why the audience was applauding (Photo: ITV) 
But Janet launches into a fierce rant about the star. 
"Why are you all applauding?," she shouts. 
"Why are all applauding? A woman gets pregnant, it's not a miracle, we all know how it happens." Beyonce announced the news on Instagram (Photo: Instagram/beyonce) 
Andrea jumps to Beyonce's defence, saying: "To be fair, how she's dressed there it does look like maybe a miracle." 
She's referring to the huge veil worn by Beyonce in the snap, in which she poses in shorts and a bra, clutching her bump, in front of a huge display of flowers. 
But Janet says: "She looks like a terrible display outside a petrol station. She looks like one of those bunches of flowers in a bucket that you walk past and say, 'Oh no, my mother-in-law's worth more than this'. Read More Pregnant Beyonce goes NAKED to celebrate her twin baby announcement Janet Street Porter said Beyonce looked like a petrol station's flower display (Photo: ITV) 
"To be honest, I wasn't even shocked by that. I thought she's just following the trend. It all started back in 1991, who can forget, Demi Moore posed on the cover of Vanity Fair. That was stylish, and now it's come down to a cheap bit of net curtain on your head and a load of economy flowers and that dodgy bra." 
The 35-year-old Halo singer - who already has daughter Blue Ivy with the rapper - made the shock announcement on Wednesday posting a stunning portrait of her baby bump on Instagram as she shared the touching news with fans. 
"We would like to share our love and happiness," she wrote in a statement on the social media site. Janet isn't a fan of Beyonce's snap (Photo: ITV) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
